mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assets (assetsType, name, owner, address, longitude, latitude, link, linkPhone, imageID, imageUrl, status, street, extJson, sourceID, fixPosition) VALUES (#{pojo.assetsType:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.name:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.owner:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.address:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.longitude:DOUBLE}, #{pojo.latitude:DOUBLE}, #{pojo.link:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.linkPhone:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.imageID:INTEGER}, #{pojo.imageUrl:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.status:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.street:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.extJson:VARCHAR}, #{pojo.sourceID:INTEGER}, #{pojo.fixPosition:INTEGER})
mapper.select: select A.streetID, A.streetName, A.latitude, A.longitude, if(B.cc is null, 0, B.cc) as cc from street A left join (select left(street, 2) street, count(street) cc from assets where deleted = 0 and assetsType = #{assetsType:VARCHAR} and street is not null and street != '黄埔区' and longitude < #{longitudeMax:DOUBLE} and longitude > #{longitudeMin:DOUBLE} and latitude < #{latitudeMax:DOUBLE} and latitude > #{latitudeMin:DOUBLE} group by left(street, 2)) B on A.streetName = B.street WHERE A.latitude > 0 and A.longitude > 0
